item.title: OpenAI与五角大楼达成协议，将部署人工智能模型
item.description: OpenAI表示已与美国战争部达成协议，将在其机密网络中部署其模型。【原文：OpenAI said it has reached an agreement with the US Department of War to deploy its models in their classified network.】

item.title: 载有银行现金的玻利维亚飞机坠毁，造成至少10人死亡
item.description: 一架载有央行现金的玻利维亚军用运输机在该国西部埃尔阿托国际机场附近坠毁，造成10多人死亡，另有若干人受伤。【原文：A Bolivian military aircraft transporting cash for the central bank crashed near El Alto International Airport in the western part of the country, leaving more than 10 people dead and an unspecified number injured.】

item.title: 五角大楼对Anthropic的人工智能业务提出质疑
item.description: 人类本位PBC今年开局势如破竹，销售额激增、多款爆款产品问世以及一轮大规模融资，使这家初创企业在成本高昂的全球人工智能竞赛中占据显著优势。【原文：Anthropic PBC started this year on a winning streak, with surging sales, multiple viral products and a large funding round all giving the startup a big advantage in the costly global AI race.】

item.title: 阿根廷国会批准劳工改革，米莱取得胜利
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔·米莱标志性的劳工改革法案在参议院扫清了最后障碍，这是这位自由主义者雄心勃勃议程中的一场关键胜利，有望助力这个南美国家重返全球市场。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei’s signature labor reform cleared its final hurdle in the Senate, a pivotal victory in the libertarian’s ambitious agenda that could help the South American nation return to global markets.】

item.title: 前美银美林银行家将在全球内幕交易案中认罪
item.description: 前美银美林投资银行家计划从法国返回美国，就向全球内幕交易团伙成员泄露内幕消息一事认罪。【原文：A former Moelis & Co. investment banker plans to return to the US from France to plead guilty to tipping off members of a global insider-trading ring.】

item.title: 派拉蒙将把华纳575亿美元债务重组为垃圾债与高评级债混合结构
item.description: 派拉蒙天空舞影业公司收购华纳兄弟探索公司的交易预计将采用投资级与垃圾级债券的非典型组合融资方案。华尔街银行正竭力开拓各类市场，为这笔收购筹集575亿美元债务资金。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp.’s takeover of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. is expected to feature an unusual combination of investment-grade and junk-rated debt, as Wall Street banks turn to as many markets as possible to raise $57.5 billion of debt for the acquisition.】

item.title: 大卫·埃里森正重整CBS新闻部；CNN或将面临同样局面
item.description: 在周四晚间的新闻播报中，美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）主播杰克·塔珀陷入尴尬境地：他不得不报道自己供职的华纳兄弟探索公司被派拉蒙天舞公司收购的消息。【原文：During his Thursday night newscast, CNN anchor Jake Tapper found himself in an awkward position: reporting on the sale of his employer, Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., to Paramount Skydance Corp.】

item.title: 美国杠杆贷款创2022年以来最大跌幅，人工智能引发担忧
item.description: 一篮子美国优质企业贷款遭遇逾三年最大月度跌幅，因市场对人工智能颠覆性影响的担忧加剧，引发抛售潮。【原文：A basket of outstanding US corporate loans suffered its steepest monthly decline in more than three years as fears of artificial-intelligence disruption deepened, sparking a selloff.】

item.title: 摩根大通警告称，高达1500亿美元的CLO贷款面临人工智能风险
item.description: 摩根大通公司表示，价值400亿至1500亿美元的杠杆贷款打包形成的美国贷款担保证券，可能因人工智能热潮而受到冲击。【原文：Anywhere from $40 billion to $150 billion of leveraged loans packaged into US collateralized loan obligations could be disrupted by the artificial intelligence boom, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 丹麦警告俄罗斯和美国干预三月大选
item.description: 丹麦情报部门警告称，外国势力可能试图干预该国3月24日的议会选举，特别指出俄罗斯是主要威胁，同时将美国和中国列为潜在影响来源。【原文：Denmark’s intelligence services warned that foreign powers may seek to interfere in the country’s March 24 general election, singling out Russia as the primary threat but also flagging the US and China as potential sources of influence.】

item.title: 华尔街量化策略手册被颠覆，人工智能重塑市场格局
item.description: 人工智能颠覆华尔街投资策略的那一周，并非始于财报不及预期或美联储意外举措，而是源于Substack平台上的一场思想实验。【原文：The week that AI upended Wall Street’s investing playbook didn’t begin with an earnings miss or a Federal Reserve surprise. It began with a thought experiment on Substack.】

item.title: 标普分析师认为派拉蒙评级因收购华纳交易而承压
item.description: 标普全球评级分析师表示，派拉蒙天空舞公司以1110亿美元收购华纳兄弟探索公司的交易将对其信用评级构成压力，即便合并后的公司最终可能逐步削减债务水平。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp.’s $111 billion bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. will strain its credit rating, an S&P Global Ratings analyst said, even if the combined company could ultimately cut its debt levels over time.】

item.title: 对冲基金因伊朗风险增持看涨原油押注至22个月高位
item.description: 对冲基金对布伦特原油的看涨情绪升至2024年4月以来最高水平，因投资者日益担忧美国在中东采取军事行动可能迫在眉睫，并可能扰乱该地区原油供应。【原文：Hedge funds turned the most bullish on Brent crude since April 2024 as investors grew more concerned that US military action in the Middle East could be imminent and disrupt oil supplies flowing out of the region.】

item.title: 黑石计划成立上市公司，大举收购人工智能数据中心
item.description: 黑石集团正推出一家公开交易的收购公司，该机构将收购数据中心，为数百万散户投资者提供押注人工智能热潮的机会。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is launching a publicly traded acquisition company that will snap up data centers, giving millions of mom-and-pop investors a chance to bet on the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 债券在向我们发出警告：不妙的事情正在发生
item.description: 地缘政治风险、人工智能升级和私人信贷传染。【原文：Geopolitical risk, AI escalation, and private credit contagion.】

item.title: 阿波罗在xAI债务上获利2.5亿美元账面收益
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司近期押注支持埃隆·马斯克的xAI项目，迄今已获得约2.5亿美元的账面收益。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has netted roughly $250 million in paper gains so far from a bet it made in recent months to support Elon Musk’s xAI.】

item.title: SpaceX考虑最早于3月提交保密IPO申请
item.description: 知情人士透露，SpaceX计划最早于下月秘密提交首次公开募股申请。这家由亿万富翁埃隆·马斯克创立的火箭与卫星公司正推进史上最大规模上市计划。【原文：SpaceX is targeting filing confidentially for an initial public offering as soon as next month, according to people familiar with the matter, as billionaire Elon Musk’s rocket and satellite company moves forward with plans for the biggest-ever listing.】

item.title: 索尼旗下Bluepoint工作室在关闭前曾提议重制《血源诅咒》
item.description: PlayStation关闭旗下备受喜爱的子公司背后的内幕【原文：The inside story of why PlayStation closed its beloved subsidiary】

item.title: RBC高收益交易台在首轮品牌亏损后出现人员流失
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大皇家银行近期已有至少五名高收益信贷分析师和交易员离职，其中部分人员转投竞争对手公司。此前该行因First Brands Group破产事件蒙受损失。【原文：At least five high-yield credit analysts and traders have left Royal Bank of Canada in recent weeks, with some joining rival firms after the bank notched losses linked to the collapse of First Brands Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币趋势交易在急剧抛售后获得喘息
item.description: 2025年加密货币市场剧烈震荡，令趋势跟踪基金遭受重创，剧烈波动抹去了数月的布局成果。而今年这场决定性的抛售潮却意外提供了喘息之机。【原文：Choppy crypto markets punished trend-following funds in 2025, with violent swings erasing months of positioning. This year’s decisive selloff has offered a reprieve.】

item.title: 美国能源信息署称，12月美国原油产量创六个月新低
item.description: 美国政府月度报告显示，去年12月美国原油产量降至每日1370万桶左右，为六个月来最低水平。【原文：US crude production fell to near 13.7 million barrels a day in December, the lowest in six months, according to a monthly report from the US government.】

item.title: 高盛称其与遭受赎回冲击的私募信贷同行不同
item.description: 高盛集团旗下资产管理部门正努力向客户保证，其最大零售导向型私募信贷基金之一的赎回率和软件风险敞口均处于相对较低水平。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s asset management arm has sought to reassure clients that redemption rates and software exposure are both relatively low in one of its biggest retail-oriented private credit funds.】

item.title: 巴西银行与奥多普雷维合并，缔造市值100亿美元的巴西医疗巨头
item.description: 巴西布拉德斯科银行与牙科保险公司奥多托普雷夫正整合其医疗保健资产，共同打造巴西规模最大的综合医疗集团之一，为全国超过1300万受益人提供服务。【原文：Banco Bradesco SA and dental insurer Odontoprev SA are combining their health-care assets to create one of Brazil’s largest integrated medical groups, serving more than 13 million beneficiaries in the country.】

item.title: 杠杆ETF费用自2020年以来翻三倍，交易员热衷高风险基金
item.description: 撬动销售【原文：Leverage sells】

item.title: 首批为福特生产零部件的制造商
item.description: 第一品牌集团旗下为福特汽车公司等车企生产零部件的工厂，目前有四家潜在买家。该破产企业正竭力避免停业清算，其提出的方案旨在挽救数千个工作岗位。【原文：First Brands Group has four potential buyers for factories that produce parts for automakers, including Ford Motor Co., under a proposal designed to save thousands of jobs as the bankrupt company struggles to avoid shutting down and liquidating its remaining operations.】

item.title: 赫格塞斯人类威胁论的核心：冷战时期法律
item.description: 五角大楼正准备在其与Anthropic PBC的对峙中采取前所未有的举措，这些举措可能引发与这家市值3800亿美元公司的重大法律纠纷，并可能危及五角大楼进一步采用人工智能的努力。【原文：The Pentagon is poised to take unprecedented steps in its standoff with Anthropic PBC that risk touching off a massive legal fight with the $380 billion company and threaten to undermine Pentagon efforts to further adopt artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 休斯顿将发行10亿美元市政债券用于会议中心扩建
item.description: 休斯顿正寄望于市政债券投资者，以资助耗资数十亿美元的会议中心扩建项目——该项目对提振市中心经济活动至关重要。【原文：Houston is counting on municipal bond investors to help fund a multibillion-dollar convention center expansion that is crucial to boosting downtown economic activity.】

item.title: 三色票据持有人起诉摩根大通、巴克莱和第五第三银行
item.description: 三色控股公司（Tricolor Holdings）发行的票据持有人起诉摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）、巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和第五第三银行（Fifth Third Bancorp），指控这些银行协助延续了这家现已破产的二手车经销商和贷款机构的欺诈行为。【原文：Holders of notes issued by Tricolor Holdings sued JPMorgan Chase & Co., Barclays Plc and Fifth Third Bancorp., accusing the banks of helping to perpetuate a fraud at the now-bankrupt used-car dealer and lender.】

item.title: 金融股遭重挫，信用危机令股指跌至三个月低点
item.description: 对人工智能威胁的焦虑情绪加剧，加上私人信贷领域的投资突然动摇，导致银行和资产管理公司股价再度遭遇重挫。【原文：Heightened anxiety about the threat from artificial intelligence and suddenly shaky bets on private credit delivered another bruising selloff in shares of banks and asset managers.】

item.title: 特朗普在最高法院败诉后面临2000起关税诉讼
item.description: 自美国最高法院裁定特朗普总统大部分全球关税政策违法以来，已有逾百家企业提起新诉讼，这凸显出各界普遍担忧：政府不会轻易退还已征收的数十亿美元关税。【原文：In the days since the US Supreme Court declared most of President Donald Trump’s global tariffs illegal, more than 100 companies filed new lawsuits, underscoring widespread concerns that the administration won’t readily refund the billions of dollars it’s already collected.】
